title: Hou Yi Shoots the Suns Quiz

items.q: What does 'archer' mean?
a: A person who uses a bow and arrow
items.explain: Hou Yi is a legendary archer who shot down the suns.

items.q: The word 'scorching' is closest in meaning to…
items.explain: The ten suns made the land scorching hot.

items.q: What is the meaning of 'hero'?
items.explain: Hou Yi is praised as a hero.

items.q: Which word means 'to aim carefully'?
items.explain: Hou Yi focused his bow before shooting.

items.q: The word 'sacrifice' means…
items.explain: Hou Yi sacrificed his own peace to save the people.

items.q: Why did Hou Yi shoot down the suns?
a: They were hiding in the sky
They wanted to fight Hou Yi
items.explain: The ten suns made rivers dry and crops die.

items.q: How many suns were there originally?
items.explain: According to the legend, there were ten suns.

items.q: Who asked Hou Yi for help?
items.explain: The people were suffering and needed Hou Yi's help.

items.q: What did Hou Yi use to shoot the suns?
items.explain: Hou Yi was known for his great archery skills.

items.q: What happened after Hou Yi shot down the suns?
a: Only one sun was left to give light
items.explain: Hou Yi left one sun so life could continue.

items.q: The ten suns appeared in the sky all at once.
items.explain: True — that’s why the earth became unbearably hot.

items.q: Hou Yi was afraid of shooting the suns.
items.explain: False — Hou Yi was brave and determined.

items.q: Hou Yi saved the people by leaving one sun.
items.explain: True — one sun was enough for balance.

items.q: Hou Yi is remembered as a selfish man.
items.explain: False — he is remembered as a hero.

items.q: Match the character with their role.
items.explain: This shows the key roles in the story.

Hou Yi used his bow and _____ to shoot down the suns.
items.explain: Hou Yi was a master of archery.

items.q: Hou Yi left only _____ sun in the sky.
items.explain: He kept one sun to provide light.

items.q: The people praised Hou Yi as a great _____.
items.explain: He is remembered as a hero in Chinese mythology.
